name: The baron got you again
description: In The baron got you again you play as a secret agent, prisonner from a cell in the middle of Argentina, inside the secret base of the vile Baron Von Rimmel. Your mission : escape, and as fast as possible. Search the different rooms to discover the bunker's exit without being noticed.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive ONLY
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980, AMD Radeon R9 390X equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive ONLY
